attributes.action: ensure no government monies are spent on the visit of the Pope.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst recognising the multi-cultural nature of Great Britain, the country is officially a protestant one. Even so, more people watch football on TV each week than attend churches. If the Pope has any additional security requirements over and above any other individual visiting this country then the cost of these should be met by the Catholic Church.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
